title: My Pixel 2XL was forcibly turned off after it stuck, and now it will not give me any response
content: My phone was forcibly turned off after it stuck, and now it will not give me any response,It worked fine before it got stuck. The battery had 38% remaining. I was watching a comic at the time. There was no response for about 3 minutes after the death. I forcibly shut down him. Now whether it is charging or trying to start, he will not give me It â€™s responding, but my computer can recognize that it's charging, and I'm trying to fully charge it, please tell me what to do.
